name: Brayan Ivan
description: Passionate about crafting efficient and scalable web applications with a focus on user experience.
about-me: Hi, I'm a Software Engineering student passionate about solving complex problems, usually using TypeScript, Python, and a few snacks. I focus on backend development, aiming to make solutions work right from the first try (no guarantees though).
NestJS and FastAPI are part of my daily toolkit, and I'm currently exploring frontend development to strengthen my full-stack profile.

Outside of coding, I spend time at the gym, looking for new libraries, or playing Overwatch (Genji main) with friends. I enjoy creating, learning, experimenting with new technologies, and constantly solving problems.

responsibilities: Developed and maintained web applications using React and Node.js.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define project requirements.
Implemented RESTful APIs and integrated third-party services.
Assisted in the development of client websites and applications.
Participated in code reviews and contributed to team knowledge sharing.
